duties_responsibilities.duty: Efficiently manage the executive's calendar, including scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements
Organize and coordinate meetings, including preparing agendas, gathering necessary materials, and arranging logistics
Arrange travel itineraries, including flights, accommodations, and transportation
Take accurate minutes during meetings and distribute them to relevant parties
Proactively handle any scheduling conflicts or changes and communicate updates as needed
Process travel expenses and maintain accurate records

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
